mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_PRODUCT.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, ORDERS.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, ORDERS.ORDER_DATE AS ORDER_DATE, ORDERS.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT FROM ORDER_PRODUCT, ORDERS, PRODUCT WHERE ORDERS.STORE_ID = #{param1} AND PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID = ORDER_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID AND ORDER_PRODUCT.ORDER_ID = ORDERS.ORDER_ID

SELECT RECEIVE.RECEIVE_DATE AS RECEIVE_DATE, RECEIVE.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID, RECEIVE_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, RECEIVE_PRODUCT.RECEIVE_QUANTITY AS RECEIVE_QUANTITY, RECEIVE_PRODUCT.LOSS_QUANTITY AS LOSS_QUANTITY FROM RECEIVE_PRODUCT, RECEIVE, PRODUCT WHERE RECEIVE.STORE_ID = #{param1} AND PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID = RECEIVE_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ORDER_PRODUCT WHERE ORDER_ID = #{param1} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{param2}
